metadata.name: Stonemosh #001
metadata.description:
Stonemosh is a series of glitch art generated from collected stone materials and drone or noise sounds.

【Stone Type】Pyrite
【Location of sampling】Tokyo, Japan
【Date of stone sampling】Aug. 18, 2020.

This work was generated from a photograph of pyrite obtained in Tokyo and a still image downloaded randomly on the same day.

The music is a combination of environmental sounds recorded in the field on the same day and sounds generated by Ableton.


2022
.mp4
1920px x 1080px
